name: treatment of lignite ash, opencast refill | lignite ash | Cutoff, U
description:
ecoQuery: https://ecoquery.ecoinvent.org/3.10/cutoff/dataset/9083/documentation

backfilled waste composition is (in ppm): H2O n.a.; O n.a.; H n.a.; C n.a.; S 19925; N n.a.; P 150.18; B 796.44; Cl 5.6604; Br 6.0377; F 18.868; I 0.75472; Ag n.a.; As 18.346; Ba 377.36; Cd 2.2324; Co 56.604; Cr 52.83; Cu 22.493; Hg 0.037926; Mn 75.472; Mo 26.282; Ni 55.949; Pb 18.393; Sb 14.867; Se 6.1626; Sn 6.0377; V 131.41; Zn 102.47; Be 3.7736; Sc 1.8868; Sr 263.49; Ti 377.36; Tl 0.074712; W 3.7736; Si 181130; Fe 20377; Ca 75472; Al 17736; K 2264.2; Mg 11321; Na 3396.2; ;[This dataset was already contained in the ecoinvent database version 2. It was not individually updated during the transfer to ecoinvent version 3. Life Cycle Impact Assessment results may still have changed, as they are affected by changes in the supply chain, i.e. in other datasets. This dataset was generated following the ecoinvent quality guidelines for version 2. It may have been subject to central changes described in the ecoinvent version 3 change report (http://www.ecoinvent.org/database/ecoinvent-version-3/reports-of-changes/), and the results of the central updates were reviewed extensively. The changes added e.g. consistent water flows and other information throughout the database. The documentation of this dataset can be found in the ecoinvent reports of version 2, which are still available via the ecoinvent website. The change report linked above covers all central changes that were made during the conversion process.]



This module contains only direct emissions from lignite ash used as backfill in opencast lignite mines: short-term emissions (0-100a) and long-term emissions (>100a) both to ground water. E.g. land-use and energy consumption is *not* included.
category: E:Water supply; sewerage, waste management and remediation activities/38:Waste collection, treatment and disposal activities; materials recovery/382:Waste treatment and disposal/3822:Treatment and disposal of hazardous waste

processDocumentation.geographyDescription: Ash composition calculated from country-specific coal composition (MK) and technology-specific transfer coefficients in power plant.
processDocumentation.technologyDescription: Lignite ash as backfill in lignite opencast mine (together with tailings)
processDocumentation.dataTreatmentDescription: Ash composition calculated from coal composition and transfer coefficients in power plant  (cf. ecoinvent coal report RÃ¶der 2003). Transfer coefficients in backfill estimated from data of residual material landfills and estimated carbonate phase of lignite ashes
processDocumentation.samplingDescription: country-specific calculation based on literature data

exchanges.description: EcoSpold01Location=MK

flow.name: lignite ash
flow.category: E:Water supply; sewerage, waste management and remediation activities/38:Waste collection, treatment and disposal activities; materials recovery/382:Waste treatment and disposal/3822:Treatment and disposal of hazardous waste

exchanges.description: Long-term emission from lignite ash backfill. Uncertainty derived from uncertainty in ash composition and uncertainty in transfer coefficients.
